alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 1:13PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Clayton, Fayette, Allamakee, Winneshiek, Winona, eastern Wabasha, Houston, eastern Fillmore, Buffalo and Trempealeau Counties through 200 PM CST... At 111 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eau Galle to near Sumner. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Union around 130 PM CST. Elgin and Clermont around 135 PM CST. Postville around 145 PM CST. Monona around 155 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Nordness, Giard, Quandahl, Riceford, Beaver Creek Valley State Park and Waucoma Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 90. Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 231 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
